summary: After 5 die in crumbling Naples housing run by Northerners, the Southern relatives trek to Milan to sue for damages.
cast: Anna Maria Ferrero|Francesco Penza|Pietro d'Addio|Guido Zacchetti|Baldassarre Caruso|Tina Castigliano|Giovanni Filidoro|Giovanni Riccardi|Eugenio Maggi|Eduardo De Filippo|Luigi Russo|Vittorio Sanipoli|Laura Gore|Irma Capece Minutolo|Michele Malaspina|Frank Latimore|Giuseppe Pica|Sonia Holm|Rita Mara|Thea Prandi|Alessandro Tedeschi
title: Napoletani a Milano
